frontmatter.title: New web site powered by Gatsby
frontmatter.subtitle: New static web site build with React and powered by Gatsby

markdownRemark.excerpt:
Today I launched my new web site where I will publish a lot about my professional life in the software 
developing business. I hope you will…
markdownRemark.html:
Today I launched my new web site where I will publish a lot about my professional life in the software developing business. I hope you will follow me and enjoy it.

One thing though, do not bookmark the site since I will soon change the domain in Github Pages where the site is hosted today. The new domain will be henrikgronvall.com

New web site powered by Gatsby

The new web site built with React, Material-UI, GraphQl and powered by the blazing fast static page generator Gatsby has been launched today. :-)

It has been an adventure since it is quiet hard to learn Gatsby in details and in this project I have choose to play around heavily testing different approached in nearly everything Gatsby has to offer.

Now, it is time for me to fill it with content, there is a lot of it and the goal is to fill more content every day the next couple of weeks. Stay tuned.

You can read more about this project at My personal web site
